          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Solar power station</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonnenenergiestation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Centrale électrique solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estação de potência solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stazione di energia solare</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Estación de la energía solar</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">How can we use the sun to produce electrical energy?
Explore the solar power station.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar power station</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie können Sie, benutzen wir die Sonne, um 
elektrisches energy?Explore zu produzieren die Sonnenenergiestation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment osez nous employons le soleil pour 
produire l'energy?Explore électrique la centrale électrique solaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como possa nós usamos o sol produzir o 
energy?Explore elétrico a estação de potência solar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come possa usiamo il sole per produrre il 
energy?Explore elettrico la stazione di energia solare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς μπορούμε να χρησιμοποιήσουμε τον ήλιο για να 
παραγάγουμε ηλεκτρικό energy?Explore ο σταθμός ηλιακής 
παραγωγής ηλεκτρικού ρεύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo pueda utilizamos el sol para producir el 
energy?Explore eléctrico la estación de la energía solar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonnenenergiestation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">centrale électrique solaire</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
